goal.ch: 吳光明（Kuang-mig Wu）於1997年在 On Chinese Body Thinking: A Cultural Hermeneutics 提出的「身體思維」的概念，以東方的角度提醒了身體──思維／身──心的重要關聯性，本課程將以此為思考，深入理解東方身體觀。
goal.en: In 1997, Kuang-ming Wu introduced the concept of “body thinking“ in his work, “On Chinese Body Thinking: A Cultural Hermeneutics,“ highlighting from an Eastern perspective the important relationship between the body and mind. This course will use this concept as a foundation for deepening the understanding of Eastern views on the body.

textbook.ch:
1.楊儒賓，《儒家身體觀》，臺北：中央研究院中國文哲研究所，1999。
2.吳光明，〈莊子的身體思維〉蔡麗玲譯，《中國古代思想中的氣論及身體觀》，臺北：巨流圖書公司，1994，頁393-414。
3.鍾雲鶯，〈身與體：《易經》儒家身體觀所呈現的兩個面向〉，《佛學與科學》， 11.1(2010): 21-28。
textbook.en:
1.Kuang-ming Wu, On Chinese Body Thinking: A Cultural Hermeneutics. Netherlands: Koninklijke Brill, 1997.
2.Kuang-ming Wu, On the “Logic” of Togetherness. Netherlands: Koninklijke Brill, 1998.

flexDiscription.ch: 第17、18週自主學習，個別指導，可將期末專題延伸投遞研討會。
flexDiscription.en: Weeks 17 and 18 involve self-directed learning with individual guidance, and students can submission to participate in a seminar.
